summary: A buff seamless male body replacer.
descriptionHtml:
This texture pack contains compatible body, face, and hand textures for a seamless fit.

Now you can have Buff seamless male nudes.

This also works well for sundracons Revealing Male Armors.

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1630086

Install my mod first then:

Download Nude Males V0.3, by thegal, found here:

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1947

Follow these easy installation instructions:

Replace the game mesh folder by dragging the Male Nude meshes folder to the game Data folder and dropping.

Open the Male Nude texture folder and delete everything except the malebody_1_msn.dds.

Now drag that texture folder to the game Data folder and drop.

 
Until the truly great body modders come along I consider this my choice for the male body.
 
This contains no esp, so just drag the texture folder to your game Data folder and drop.

As always, my mods are open for use by others without further permission.

>>>>>>>>>>
Thanks to thegal for providing even more choices for the male body.

Many thanks to Bethsoft for an excellent game. Hope to thank them sooon for a CS.

Thanks to Darkone for providing a home for modders and downloaders.
author: Bond
